pli-tv-pvr1.3:0.2: The monks’ rules and their analysis
pli-tv-pvr1.3:1.1: For having sexual intercourse, in how many ways does one fail out of the four kinds of failure?
pli-tv-pvr1.3:1.2: For having sexual intercourse, one fails in two out of the four kinds of failure:
pli-tv-pvr1.3:1.3: one may fail in morality;  one may fail in conduct. …
pli-tv-pvr1.3:2.1: For, out of disrespect, defecating, urinating, or spitting in water, in how many ways does one fail out of the four kinds of failure?
pli-tv-pvr1.3:2.2: For, out of disrespect, defecating, urinating, or spitting in water, one fails in one of the four kinds of failure:
pli-tv-pvr1.3:3.1: The third section on failure is finished.
